subject: RE: [junit] Re: JUnit 4 restructuring
msgSnippet: ... Shouldn t the arguments be in the opposite order, for consistency with the other assert* methods?  The rest of them are always (thing I want, thing I got).
messageBody:
David Saff wrote:

> I really like assertThat. I've reimplemented it at least
> twice to take advantage of
> generics:
>
> public void <T> assertThat (T obj, Constraint<T> constraint);

Shouldn't the arguments be in the opposite order, for
consistency with the other assert* methods? The rest
of them are always (thing I want, thing I got).


Todd.
